message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I know will be highly valuable to your business. I'm confident it's worth at least $1,200,000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,100,000, which represents a significant savings for you.  This is a one-time offer, and I'm sure you'll agree it's a great deal. Let me know your decision.
